content: @Brett Esler watching the confluence notifications about this - it seems very narrowly focused on provider directory?

Next week 26th-27th September is provider directory ONLY - running through Agency Secure Messaging Technical Working Group + HL7 AU PA WG http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/AFR/2017-09+Brisbane
General connectathon is 16-17th October http://www.hl7.org.au/events/hl7-australia-october-2017-wgmagm-education-and-connectathon-event-brisbane/
oh ok I didn't notice the difference
I got confused by this too!
